segments.text: I ’ m sure it will be wet when we arrive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I dare say it will be .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be Sunday so I expected everything will be closed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I don ’ t think that ’ s possible . Some places are sure to be open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the bank should be closed so we shouldn't to be able to get any money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think we ’ ll need our overcoats ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be summer . So it will be hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that very likely in England ?
segments.speaker: S1
